content.detailedDescription: Watching television, time approximately 7 pm. i am always a late sleeper, usually in bed by 4 or 5 am. i was not employed, at this stage of my life. i felt and overwhelming sensation, to go to sleep. the t.V turned into a static  screen. i turned it off and went to bed. in my mind, i heard a loud metallic type noise. it sounded like a freight train. it began at a low noise level and increased to a very loud level. as if some thing was approaching me. oddly enough, as loud as this metallic noise was, it was not discomforting in any way. the impression that came to me, was that this noise was part of a tunneling process.Tunneling through space. i was then standing in a round room, with 3 beings in front of me. the room, for the lack of a better word. was a gun metal grey color,completely smooth. instinct told me, perhaps a vessel of some kind. this room was completely empty of any structures. as my mind turned it's attention, back to the beings. the tallest of these beings, who i approximate was at least 11 ft tall. was seated on a gun metal grey color chair, more like a throne to be precise. behind him seemed to be a screen, though it was the same color as the room. it gave me the impression that it was a screen, due to the gaps or edges that defined it from the wall or room surface. this screen would have been about, 15 ft in length and 5 ft in height. he possessed angular features, from head to feet. he had long white hair, at least to his elbows. he wore a grey type flight suit, my best description. to his right hand side was another male being, similar looks, but about 10 ft tall. to his left was a female, about 9, 9 and half ft tall. the seated being seemed to be the one in charge. from what i have come to understand, through telepathy is how we communicated. i asked him, " why do you not show yourself to mankind? " as his answer was being heard in my mind, the room transformed itself. for the lack of a better word. to a scene from world war 1. that was my impression. " mankind is a violent species, you are not yet ready. " while my mind was hearing this, i took in visually the death and destruction around me. i seemed to be in a cratered and muddy field. it was dark, not so dark. perhaps just after sun set. bodies ever where, men running past me with bayonets fastened to their weapons. charging an unseen enemy. i could  see smoke and explosions erupting every where. i could see me falling, to the ground with anguished looks on their faces. it is if i was really there. except that there was absolutely no noise, nor did i feel any fear. my next recollection was waking up at home, at about 1 am i guess. the t.V was on.
content.summary: Tall nordic angular looking beings.

content.detailedDescription: Where :my apartment  what :i was looking out in the parking lot when a bright lights appears in the sky    i notice it because it was the only bright light in the sky and the sun was setting plus it only 730pm with clear sky i thought it was a star at first then i got my camcorder at closer look it was emitting a few different color lights and it hovered then as i watch my camcorder it was slowly nw with the sun then around 810pm their was two one very low other very high both following the sun at 9p its out of sight i'm not sure of the feeling i was having it gave something to do but after when i got a objects coming out of another objects that moved me and i was my eyes where wide open i was feeling good i got it on tape lost sight because of the trees     i have no photos just videos sorry!             my ps3 won't upload videos
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a small town of 5,000 i live out in the country surrounded by grape vineyards. it is pretty quiet out here. at 10:00 pm on june 5, 2013 i seen from inside my window an orange object that caught my eye above a wide tree down the road from my home. i went out on our front porch steps looking at it also with my binoculars. it hovered at first. then very slowly moved from left to right over the tree tops. then slowing going at a snail pace speed it then moved down behind the trees then back out again. then i seen a small plane with a white blinking light passing the object above heading south. the plane then turned back around towards the object looked as if to view it. then the plane headed not south like it was but, north away from the object and left. minutes later, i noticed two other planes coming from the north heading towards the object not getting too close circling it then left. the object then went further away heading west until it disappeared out of view. this object was not blinking and was silent. i watched it for 30 minutes. knowing it was not a plane at all. i was amazed i was able to see such a sight. 3 days prior to this event i was awoken by what sounded like a military helicopter around 1:30 in the morning. i am familiar with those sounds because, my husband used to be in the army. the sound came above our house and lasted for several minutes driving me crazy. it was loud. no lights from the helicopter, just sound. i couldn't see anything and went back to bed. 
i have reported another ufo event i witnessed to the sanger paranormal society. two now to them. this last event to them b y email earlier tonight. i am the first fowler resident that had reported ufo activity to the sanger ufo society they said.  the weather that night when i seen that orange glowing object was perfect. not hot not cold. maybe a very light breeze. clear night sky. i forgot to take any photos. 

thank you
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright, glowing silent orange ball

I live in a small town of 5,000 i live out in the country surrounded by grape vineyards. it is pretty quiet out here. at 10:00 pm on june 5, 2013 i seen from inside my window an orange object that caught my eye above a wide tree down the road from my home. i went out on our front porch steps looking at it also with my binoculars. it hovered at first. then very slowly moved from left to right over the tree tops. then slowing going at a snail pace speed it then moved down behind the trees then back out again. then i seen a small plane with a white blinking light passing the object above heading south. the plane then turned back around towards the object looked as if to view it. then the plane headed not south like it was but, north away from the object and left. minutes later, i noticed two other planes coming from the north heading towards the object not getting too close circling it then left. the object then went further away heading west until it disappeared out of view. this object was not blinking and was silent. i watched it for 30 minutes. knowing it was not a plane at all. i was amazed i was able to see such a sight. 3 days prior to this event i was awoken by what sounded like a military helicopter around 1:30 in the morning. i am familiar with those sounds because, my husband used to be in the army. the sound came above our house and lasted for several minutes driving me crazy. it was loud. no lights from the helicopter, just sound. i couldn't see anything and went back to bed. 
i have reported another ufo event i witnessed to the sanger paranormal society. two now to them. this last event to them b y email earlier tonight. i am the first fowler resident that had reported ufo activity to the sanger ufo society they said.  the weather that night when i seen that orange glowing object was perfect. not hot not cold. maybe a very light breeze. clear night sky. i forgot to take any photos.

content.detailedDescription: Very clear,dark night,no clouds, looking up at the stars i noticed a light traveling at a very high rate of speed from northwest to southeast, when it suddenly stopped,sat there for about thirty seconds,then went backwards a few miles,stopped,stayed there about another thirty seconds,then took off like a bat out of hell on its original course southeast.   then about a minute later there was another object similiar to the first one, but it was coming from the west,heading east,this one did not stop,just continued east very,very fast.   these objects were not planes,they were going way too fast,and they were not satellites,because they were not in outer space, these were definitely in the atmosphere, guessing about 50-60 thousand feet up..  i live on the north shore of kauai- not much up here no light pollution, very good for looking at the sky--  we see weird stuff here all the time..  mahalo
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object moving across sky at high rate of speed,sudden stop,goes backwards,stops,then proceeds on original path

content.detailedDescription:
after waiting a year i am going to report this because i can't get it out of
my mind. between 10 and 10:30 pm on 5/11/12 i was headed to my mail box
before i left for work(i work overnights) and saw something in the sky. i always look at the sky at night because i love the stars. it appeared about the size the moon would look except it was low in the west sky and at that time the moon would have been rising in the east. it was a sphere that had multiple swirling colors and was stationary. at first i thought it was something on fire, but there were no flames or tail or smoke. it was perfectly round. after a few minutes, on the side of the circle facing south, a rectangle opened up and the thing started moving very slowly toward the north. i watched until it was out of sight as it went behind some low clouds to the north, maybe 10 minutes or so. i was so mesmerized by it that i didn't think to take a picture. all of a sudden i found myself standing in the middle of the street with my mouth open. i have tried to draw it,  but i can't capture the feeling of the swirling motion of the colors. it was amazing to witness this. i have at times been watching something on ufo's and thought "why didn't they take a picture?". i just couldn't believe what i was seeing. i have no idea how large or how far away this was. if someone had just glanced up and not really paid attention, they might have thought it was a harvest moon. but i stopped and looked at it closely and saw the swirling colors. i have never experienced anything like this before or since.
content.summary: Circle with swirling colors

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly before 4:00am, as i couldn't sleep i got up and dressed.  i then looked out from my bedroom window facing west and immediately noticed a bright white light over the nw horizon, too bright to be a planet or a star. (it was about 3 to 4 times brighter than venus can be at it's brightest.) i kept looking and noticed it was moving slowly without blinking. i got out to have a better look. i realised it didn't look like the jet airplanes i sometimes see in the sky. no blinking lights, just one very bright light.

i went back inside and got my camera (lumix dmc-fz28, with an 18x zoom) and managed to film 40 seconds of it. in all, it was visible for about three minutes before it disappeared below the se horizon. when i first saw it nw, it was about 25 degres. at its highest, facing south, about 35 degrees.

i guess it must always have been more than one mile away.

the observation occured between 3:50 and 3:55 am.  at this latitude, date and time, it's still night but the ne horizon is already turning blue.
it was a clear sky.

it was not a conventional plane, helicopter, satellite or chinese lantern.
it looked white to the naked eye but the recording reveals colors
content.summary: Bright unblingking white light crossed the sky in three minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I happen to look out my back door and saw this bright light silently moving from the west to the south very low.  it was making no sound and acending to the west.  i called my wife out to see it which she did. about 1 minute later another one the same size followed behind it.  it was no airplane.  they were not navigation or collision lights or strobes.  there were a couple of high altitude airliners at the same time but not near the sightings. my neighbor across the street witnessed it also. i took some video with my cell phone but by the time i got my phone it was just a light in the video.  not much to see.
content.summary: Very bright pulsating red/orange silent light

content.detailedDescription: It was fairly large and appeared larger in  night sky than a star and brighter.  it was not a plane and didn't have blinking lights.  seem to fly at height of plane though.  i just woke up to shut bedroom sliding door due to it getting chilly.  i glanced up and saw it moving accross the sky.  i was not afaid.  i often see satilites and this was not one.  they look like a star and eventually fade as their surface is unable to reflect off sun due to position.  this held consistent brightness and same speed. was too low to be a jet.  i was not afraid but thought wow.
content.summary: It was a light that travelled through sky.  it appeared larger than a star and brighter.  moved in straight path and did n't move about.  too fast for plane and too low for a satilite.

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful and sunny day. i was playing at the front of the house, with a friend's child. there was approximately 5 other people in the street, who observed this event. the child alerted me to look up. from the south i noticed a large orange orb. it looked like a small sun, glowing. it was bright orange, but did not hurt your eyes to look at it. as it neared close and above me, i could have hit it with a rock. that is how close it was. from out of no where, a smaller orange orb appeared. side by side they moved off, towards and over the ocean. they flew past the naval base, on garden island. they continued non stop, until i could no longer see them on the horizon. i have seen these orbs again in sydney australia, years later. four of them on this occasion, they flew in a straight line. then changed course for space.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb, passed directly over my head. about 30 feet in diameter. a smaller orb materialized beside the larger one. size about 10 feet in diameter. they few together at a low rate of speed, over suburbia . then headed over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i both saw this light in the sky at the same time. we live in a city of 200k people so there is plenty of light pollution. it was a clear night and we saw what appeared to be a satellite. it was not blinking so i ruled out plane. it was moving a little faster than most satellites typically do. it was a very weak light as if a dim star but being able to see it in the middle of town it must have been brighter than it appeared. i was moving across the sky and then began to wobble making several "u" shaped deviations from the flight path and then began going straight again. i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but my wife saw the same thing at the same time i did. it was visible for less than 1 minute and then faded away. as soon as it disappeared an airplane flying at relatively low altitude (landing at nearby airport) went by overhead.
content.summary: Satellite-like with a wobbly path

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 5/14/2013, between 2045 and 2100 central time, i opened my front door to let my dog outside.  i followed her, and just like always, i happened to look up into the sky.  there it was, moving swiftly and silently, directly over my home.

my first thought was that it was some type of drone aircraft, then i immediately realized i heard no sound.  what truly caught and kept my attention was the lighted tips of the object, which formed a perfect triangle.  also, the lights were not very bright, however they were white (non-colored).  all three lights seemed to radiate at the same intensity, and the best way i can describe it is as if a dimmer light switch is adjusted to about 70%.

another thing struck me as interesting is that it was flying in a "skewed" position.  let me try to describe.  if you imagine an airplane, with a light at the nose and a light at the end of each wing, the light at the nose will always be in the lead, and the wing lights will always stay equidistant in their position, and  uniform as the plane moves forward.  the same would be true if there was no light on the nose, but two lights at the tips of the wing and one on the tail.  from a view on the ground, the flat side with the two lights at the tips/edges would be moving forward (in the lead), followed by the light at the tail.  

this object flew forward as if it was turned at about 30 degrees off the center axis, so i could not tell what was in the "lead".  it only kept its  uniform,  steady shape as it flew.  

this entire sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds.  of course, i had no camera with me, and i did run in and inform my wife of what i saw, and unfortunately there were no other witnesses. 

i have always had a historical fascination with "stuff" like this.  i had read enough non fiction about such instances to know that black triangles and the "cigar" shaped crafts are some of the most recognized shapes that have been recorded. so, i knew exactly what it was when i saw it. 

shape: what i saw was most closely described as what you have in this link as fig 5. first version of tip lights illustration.  the tips definitely seemed a little rounded, not pointed.

speed: well, i could not judge the speed but it seemed to be moving swiftly for the sighting to only last for about 10 seconds, especially from the point of view i had.  

size: if you take a silver dollar out of your pocket and hold it between your index finger and thumb, and then extend your arm above you and look at the flat side of the coin, that is approximately how large the object appeared from my ground perspective.  i have read that some witnesses state that these things are very, very large.  well, if they are, then from my view (size of a silver dollar), it was fairly high up.

other features: some articles i have seen reference a light (red) in the center of the underside of the craft.  there were no other lights visible on the object that i saw.

direction:  i found my home on google maps and judging by its direction, it was traveling due north.  if you continue due north from franklin tn, you will pass by the western edge of the city limits of nashville.

i hope this helps for your records.  again, i never thought i would be reporting anything such as this, so this has truly been a fun exercise.
content.summary: Black triangle, direct slow moving path due north, corners glowed with dim white light

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the ufo from my bedroom i wes going to the wc when i saw the ufo it was on next door griss the ufo was not vrey big  black all over it had red light cameing from inside i was going to take a photo of it as i was geting to take the photo of it the ufo fly straight up the women that live in the flat whay the ufo got very ill and die i was with my mum and dad at the hospital in epping the dr say to my mum he did not know why the woman die my mum know the women all the vegetation all die thank you for your time
content.summary: Very small

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from my parents house with my wife though we took seperate cars, and as a ufo beliver i always like watching the sky for anything unusal. driving down alburtis rd towards macungie, pa i thought i saw a low flying object in the near distance but was blocked by the shipping warehouse after first seeing it. i was aproching the turn by mack trucks and saw another car pulled off to the side of the road ( i do not know if they were there to watch the object or for other reasons) though they were pulled over at an odd spot. i drove up the road a bit and pulled over my the school bus depot. from there i rolled down my windows and observed the object for roughly 5 min then it moved slowly towards the mountains. after i lost it behind the trees i decided to head home knowing my wife would be wondering why i was so late though i wanted to follow it(just to deterime if it was a helicopter). total time seeing the object in that spot would be roughtly 10 min though most likely slightly less. the object itself was low flying if i had to geuss i would say 300ft and it was just red light i was trying to see probing white light (like most natural aircraft) but did not see it. to be honest if i had to say it was most likely a helicopter but the bright red lights and lack of sound espcially for being seemingly so close made me think it could be somthing else. i work and live near the hospital and can hear their helicopter all the time and this seemed to be slightly lower too.  i was just goin to let it go till i read an article today about mufon case #47879 in reading whitch isnt too far away. perhaps there is some corilation
content.summary: Maybe just a helicopter - but lacked sound

content.detailedDescription:
Observed an object in the sky moving at a rapid pace west to east. looked like a satellite, single dim light 

object stopped in one spot, looked to turn, and 3 bright lights were facing me. felt eerie. lights were bigger/brighter then all the stars around, haven't seen anything like that in the sky ever. and i constantly gaze into the stars from my balcony while smoking. 
 .
. . <- how the lights looked like. duration of lights looking at me, 10 seconds. then all of a sudden, it looked like it did a 180, and just ascended quickly into the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed an object in the sky moving at a rapid pace west to east. looked like a satellite, single dim light   object stopped in one spot, looked to turn, and 3 bright lights were facing me.

content.detailedDescription: Steeped out on porch and saw glowing ufo traveling fast we from nw. seconds later bright light coming from n to south just in front of house. disappeared then reappeared a second later as if it stopped for two seconds then after passing in front of th house i could see the shape of the object and a dull light reviling a round object. it terrified my non believing wife who usually criticisms me perfusaly now will tell you the whole story. i have two more story's and a clip from two more encounters the the following nights that will make your skin crawl. the video of the orange light brighter than a street light was caught on my phone camera but never showed up after reviewing the recording....I'm just amazed at all the activity going on here in little ol boise and am now a full on believer!
content.summary: First object appeared to stars legnight ang glowing not shining,second was orange sphere.

content.detailedDescription:
55 year old white male have lived in bedford tx next to dfw airport for 11.5 years. i'm an electrical engineer very well versed in engineering, technology in general, aeronautics, astronautics, astronomy, meteorology, and physics.

the sighting took place over about 1 minute sunday morning january 6, 2013 about 7:15 am cst. it was in the east and on the compass about 140 degrees azimuth and 40-50 degrees in elevation.

driving east from bedford tx to longview tx on hwy 183 just south of dfw airport when i noticed a very bright, very well defined, very small cylinder with sharply defined, round symmetrical ends the ends being mirror images it had the typical pale yellow orange color of a cloud at sunrise. no wispy or rough edges, completely smooth, symmetrical, and geometric.

first thought was a cloud but the obvious smooth well defined geometric shape and the fact that there was never a change in the shape seemed to belie this. in addition as i turned south on hwy 360 south i was able to scan almost the entire sky and there was no other cloud in any form or fashion anywhere else so i rejected cloud.

next a jet con trail however as i watched keeping this in mind, again, static, no growth, movement, dissipation, or edges becoming ragged. i want to point out that since i was a child the first thing i do when i walk outside is to look up in the sky and will, invariably, stop and watch as a con trail is painted on the sky so i'm very familiar with the dynamics of con trails.

all of a sudden the entire object disappeared and re-appeared flashing 3 times in approx 1 second. it returned to full brightness for a very few seconds then rapidly faded and vanished, in place no hint of motion, i'd say in about 1/2 second very quickly. object never reappeared. on the long trip to longview had many opportunities to see jet condensation trails and it reinforced my belief that what i saw was not a cloud nor a con trail.

i've seen weather balloons naked eye and through binoculars and this doesn't fit as the cigar shape was almost parallel to the horizon plus the flashing and disappearance would have to be caused by something eclipsing a very large object in the sequence above.

could not be a reflection in my windshield because the object remained at the same point in the sky when i turned through 90 degrees.

no idea on distance, altitude, or size. i never felt panicked or stressed but calm and stimulated by the experience.

way too bright, large, and fixed to be a satellite. no way any known astronomical event too bright if nothing else, not marsh gas and if i understand correctly temperature inversions are much closer to the horizon and thus would negate them as the cause. someone attempting a hoax way to complicated if not impossible.
content.summary: Hovered the blinked out completely 3 times in a second came back up for a few seconds then disolved in less than a second

content.detailedDescription: Friend from kenosha wiisconsin tellsi me,for pasting two days black helochopters arare circleing an area near her. she contacted news stations and they know nothing. this event is still going on now. she hasent seen any ufo but this activity has never happened before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black ops helochopters no ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription: (historical case events timeline)  jun 2009 at 01:01am; five mornings in a row, red light, fixed position in the east, appears to be 300 feet away, clarkston, mi.  witness (a) walks out onto deck at exactly same time 5 mornings in succession, watches red pulsating light for 5 to 10 minutes, returns inside and goes to bed.  witness did not observe the appearance nor disappearance of the red lighted object.  / jun 2009 at 01:01am; witness (a) walks out onto deck, on the sixth successive morning, at exactly same time, observes orange pulsating, glowing light, at the same fixed position in the east, 300 feet away.  orange light morfs into a black triangle with 3 white lights at the corners, with the domed orange light on the bottom, a little forward of center, shines down upon the water of nearby lake, 300 feet away, the black triangle is about 300 feet long, appears as a 8 to 9 foot thick triangle with embossed raised black chinese type lettering along this surface, black lettering on black surface, long white lighted window full length of rear surface, the black triangle follows the perimeter of a small lake as if searching for something.  witness did not observe the appearance of the orange light nor disappearance of black triangle, clarkston, mi / jun2012 evenings, time unknown; five evenings in succession, a group of lights, multi-colors; white-red-green-blue, observed in the eastern sky traveling in a circle, with a black center, sometimes in slightly different locations in eastern sky, fenton, mi. / dec 2012 evenings, time unknown; several evenings in a row, a group of lights, multi-colors; white-red-green-blue, observed in the eastern sky traveling in a circle, with a black center, sometimes in slightly different locations in eastern sky, fenton, mi.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red pulsating light fixed position / orange pulsating light same position, morfs into black triangle / multi-color lights traveling in circular pattern

content.detailedDescription:
About 8:15 pm twilight on a very raining day, i stepped outside the house to close the gate left open. when i looked to my left (sw) i saw an object hovering slowly towards my direction above the tallest trees, it looked like a fire lit chinese lantern, but it was a clear glass dome with the fire flickering inside flat grey bottom. i got upset thinking it was heading towards the trees in our yard, above the house and it kept going at about 10 miles per hour. i thought some careless person lit it up and it could cause a fire. the object never dropped down it kept going on a steady path going ne. one of my neighbors from accross the street drove up to his driveway and got out with his child and stood observing it also. i told him that could cause a fire. he nodded towards me, but never took his eyes off of it. i went inside to tell my husband. he looked at me like are you sure thats what you saw?. i posted the incident on my facebook after realizing i may have seen another ufo. i felt like an idiot, it never crossed my mind. it was raining, and it hovered in a windless looking path.
also the fact that it was see through, it look like a glass dome, which would be too heavy to be caught up on a wind stream. i was baffled, so finally i doing this report. i've yet to speak to the neighbor but my husband said he would. end of report.
content.summary: Glass like dome with a orange yellow fire inside floating like a chinese latern.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking with a friend and was looking up at the stars when i noticed a sort of dull bluish green object in the sky, seemingly lower than the stars heading from east to west. i think there may have been a very faint trail behind it but i'm not positive. for a split second i thought it might be a shooting star. we watched it heading in a straight path, going pretty fast until it was out of sight, which took about a minute. just after it was out of sight another one came from the same place going the same direction, and we lost sight of it behind a tree. we waited for it to come out on the other side but it didn't. i felt excited, i've always wanted to see a ufo and i couldn't believe it. shortly afterward at about 2:30 am we went outside for a cigarette and saw a third this time heading the same direction but coming from a different spot in the sky. we watched it until it went behind some dark clouds that we didn't notice at first since the sky is fairly clear tonight.
content.summary: Saw one starlike object heading from east to west, when out of sight another came heading same path.

content.detailedDescription: My family lives in an apartment on the bottom of a hill, on the top of the hill is a baseball diamond, and right on the edge of the fence is woods, so we are used to hearing stuff when we go out there. usually it's just rustling of leaves and animal noises. this past month my mother has been hearing the "droid" sound usually pretty quiet and far off, like when you turn on a droid phone (5 times in the last 30 days). my mother's name is j; she and her friend k, were out on the porch having a cigarette tonight, while i was putting my daughter to bed, so i didn't see this part. they said they were outside smoking when they heard the "droid" sound, so naturally curious, they went up to the top of the hill to look and see if there was someone walking around in the baseball field. they said they saw a white softball-sized light, hovering in the air, with little blue and red beams underneath it (kind of like a flashlight with glow sticks hanging off of it i guess) and a few human like shadows. they are unsure of how many there were, but they estimate 3. they said it looked like there was one on the left side of the light, and one on the right, and about 5 feet in height, but they are unsure because it was far away. they said they saw the things move and sway, but not any extraordinary or fast movement. next, they said they noticed a big figure, approximately 7 feet in height and 4 feet, shoulder width, which was standing behind the light. they are unsure whether it just appeared, or if it walked up, or if it was already there and they just didn't notice it. that one did not appear to be doing anything but standing there, watching the other ones 'dance'. j and k said they stood and watched the beings, mystified and silent for 10 minutes or so, before they realized that they probably shouldn't spy. so, they walked back down the hill, and went inside. i walked out of my daughters bedroom, just as they came inside, and that is when they told me what happened. they looked shaken and serious. after a long fight to get the kid to sleep, i needed a cigarette, so the three of us went back out to smoke again. we did not go to the top of the hill to investigate any further. in fact, we heard a noise off in the distance (in the same general direction in which they said they'd seen the things) that sounded like a shovel digging in the dirt. we felt uneasy/like we were being watched, and went back inside. i plan on going out there tomorrow to see if i can find anything that might answer some questions.
content.summary: Outside smoking cigarette, heard a noise, went on top of the hill, looked onto the baseballfield, saw what looked like flashlights and glowsticks..

content.detailedDescription: I walk out on our patio to smoke and noticed a very big bright red object in the sky. at first i thought wow that's a bright planet or something then noticed it was moving across the sky. i opened the door and yelled at my wife to come out and look at this. she said the same thing it was not like any plane she had ever seen. i watched it for about two minutes or so total until i lost sight behind my neighbors house. i then ran to the other side of my yard to see if i could get a look at it again. i could not see it, but noticed straight out in front of me there was another large red light. it was moving from right to left across the sky. i called my wife over. her first words was how did it get over here. i believe it was a different object. it then stopped, and we watched it for a couple minutes. it still appeared bright then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Two solid bright red objects moving across sky

content.detailedDescription: We were barbequeing and had seen it a week before, so my brother in law said we should charge up the batteries for the vhs recorder that his mom gave my neices. the next week we tried it out without even testing it and got some good footage better than anything i have seen on tv, i have told you guy's about this years ago and this is the last time i will. it is an orb that is extremely bright, i got to a stationary position behind the trees and you can see it moving through, to me it seems like kids on a joyride and they didn't think i would be using an old vhs recorder. i have sound and it is definitly different. we see stuff all the time out fishing up in the foothills and they seem to be taking energy from the powerlines.My feelings on the subject used to be in the "wow" factor but i have gotten used to it, what are you gonna do? if yo want a copy or the original you can see it turns res and disappears. i have not converted it to digital so i cannot browse.
content.summary: See them all the time but this one was really close and got a good video of it

content.detailedDescription:
first caught sight of object about 60* on southern horizon while standing on the front porch. (from targhee towne subdivision, just over the wyoming state line in teton valley, near driggs, idaho) larger than a star or planet, flying under 1 mile altitude. object glowed white, looked like a single object, but when observed with binoculars, was actually 3 objects flying in tight triangular formation. 
  orbs moved silently northeast, curving in a wide arc, till they began to go through cloud cover. my husband, daughter and i moved to the back porch, looking through binoculars. my daughter got a great look at the formation through the binoculars of the 3 orbs before they ducked behind the clouds. at this point, the orbs were out of sight for less than a minute, then re-appeared as they continued traveling up over the mountains, just to the north of the grand teton. looks like they flew right over mary's nipple up by targhee resort, about 6 miles away.
   seeing strange things in the night sky is a regular thing in this valley - i'll sign on again soon, and give a timeline of other various events over the years, with full details. 
   always happy to see our friends from way, way, way out of town :) i must admit, it's a beautiful place to sight-see. although based on their past behavior, i think they were most probably checking out water resources in alaska basin. (i've seen about a dozen of these formations flying in and out of the basin over the years.)
   objects eventually went over the mountains, dropping down below our line of sight. entire encounter lasted about 4 minutes. 
~3 white, glowing lights, no pulsing, steady curved flight-path, no sound, no vibration (sometimes you feel a charge while they pass over). we've had several sightings similar to this. 
~myself, my husband, and our 13 year old daughter were all witness to this encounter. if anyone wants to get together and chat about it - find me: chris, in targhee towne, with the big garden. folks will know who i am.
content.summary: 3 small white orbs flying in formation over alta, wy in teton valley (wy/id)

content.detailedDescription: I live and work in flushing, queens. i'd gone with my family in the evening of 6/5/2013 to watch my son's spring concert over at this school. upon traveling by foot, we first noticed it while walking east. the object was hovering in the south direction. luckily i had brought my new camera to record the school production. this occurred at about 5:40ish. we stood and watched it periodically and noticed it hadn't moved at all. it just floated there at a very high altitude. i snapped several shots and kept getting nothing at first. my camera is a cannon powershot sx500 and capable of zooming in quite a long distance while maintaining detail. it wasn't until we got to my son's school (still monitoring the object to make sure it was still there) that i brought it to other parents' attention. there were over 30 people all outside waiting to be let into the school. quickly, all eyes were turned to the skies. many met what they were seeing with confusion, keen interest and some skeptic. soon, even the skeptics were unsure what they were seeing with their own 2 eyes. the object was still hovering and unmoved. still giving off some kind of odd glow. after 4 more attempts with the camera, i finally managed to get it. it didn't take long for all those who witnessed what i'd seen, to be convinced, whether they believe in et's or not, that this was simply not something man-made, but rather some kind of organic life form. the object was gone once i left the school an hour later, with no trace of where it had gone to. i am excited and pleased to have a very clear photo of the sighting. i am hoping someone out there can tell me what this thing is!
content.summary: Strange organic-type ufo with appendages

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned to my apartment complex and as i was walking across the parking lot, i looked up and saw what at first looked like a low flying plane.  being around 10:30pm, i expected to see a series of blinking lights as normal.  instead i saw what appeared to be a slow moving fireball, approximately 4 times larger than the usual sight of a plane flying at that local altitude.
i watched it move from the east, and just as it was directly overhead the light it emitted vanished and i could no longer see the ufo.  
it was as if all of its light was coming from the front of what ever it was and as soon as it was passed my field of vision, it became invisible.

two things about this event left me with an eerie feeling.
1) the object was entirely silent
2) it appeared that multiple shooting star like objects ejected from it from multiple directions.
content.summary: Looked like a slow moving fireball with mild directional changes, multiple shooting stars came out in all directions

content.detailedDescription:
We (boyfriend and i) went outside to stargaze at about 10pm. after a few minutes we both zeroed in on this "star" that appeared to be moving over the lake from the south. we both asked at the same time if it was and after watching it a few moments, it was in fact moving. the orb itself looked as though it was a much brighter star approximately twice the size of the average visible star. as it continued it seemed to slow, brighten and turn towards the northeast. the brightness was comparable to headlights at a great distance, bright but not harsh.
we continued watching for what seemed like much longer then a few minutes. do not feel as though i was missing time, but it was slower.

we both remained calm and had a very large sense of  awe and wonder upon seeing the orb. very peaceful.
content.summary: Bright orb over lake nipissing

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out in my back yard and i heard a helicopter noise so i looked up and not even 3o feet above the roof of my house i saw 2 blacked out helicopters no lights no descreptive features made noise right behind them was a triangle craft i looked up as it passed directly over me it was  like a stealth bomber but had lights under it at first i thought it was spot lights but they didnt project all the way to the ground lit up under side of craft only the lights were only white and there was 4 of them once the ufo passed over me 1 more blacked out helicopter was trailing it and same thing as the first 2 it was blacked out it was coming from the sw and heading towrds red rock canyon area . the next day my a/c was broken in my house . i allways told myself in my head it was just the military but after i researched online today about visitations in lasvegas and read about all the triangles i knew it was something more and maybe has personaly affected my  life
content.summary: I was outside saw 2 black helicopters then ufo then one more black heli next day my a/c wasnt working inmy house ufo passed over my roof/

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house on flame avenue in salton city, ca admiring the amount of stars we could see that night. i noticed the object because i was scanning the sky for bright stars and planets. initially, i thought it was a star. when j noticed it moving, i thought it was a satellite. when i noticed it move very quickly, i realized it couldn't be a satellite. it picked up speed and disappeared outward into space. immediately after it did that, 2 government fighter jets flew by our house. i'm presuming due to the object. when i saw it, i was excited. when i was a 14 year old girl, i was lucky enough to witness a strange red/orange ufo above me at the park in newport beach, ca. so after this small sighting at 28 years old (and this was nothing compared to my experience as a 14 year old) i was happy and elated to have seen something remotely similar. it helps to confirm a memory that is so profound in my life and my belief system. i lost sight of the object when it flew outward, away from our planet.
content.summary: I saw what i thought was a star. noticed it moving and thought it was a satellite. then it picked up to a very fast speed and disappeared outward into space. immediately then, two government fighter jets flew by as well. & into space.
